title: Time to grow
creator_credit: Rodney Musch, Don Anderson and Tasmania. Directorate of Industrial Development and Trade
brief_description: Shows some of the agricultural activities which form the basis of Tasmania’s economy, including dairying, beef cattle and sheep. Emphasises the need for increasing intensification of efficiency in farming methods as the world population rapidly increases.
creator_credit_for_label: Rodney Musch, Don Anderson and Tasmania. Directorate of Industrial Development and Trade
